metadata.title: Yen Wee Lim - Senior Data Scientist & AI Consultant
metadata.description: Senior Data Scientist building AI-powered solutions at the intersection of machine learning, data engineering, and business intelligence. Specializing in agentic AI, financial modeling, and enterprise data platforms.
metadata.author: Yen Wee Lim
metadata.ogTitle: Yen Wee Lim - Senior Data Scientist & AI Consultant
metadata.ogDescription: Professional portfolio showcasing AI/ML projects, data engineering solutions, and consulting services in Malaysia.

intro.description: Always interested in new opportunities, collaborations, and conversations about AI, data science, and machine learning.

services.title: Agentic AI / LLM Automation
services.description: Building intelligent AI agents and automated intelligent workflows using modern LLM frameworks to streamline business processes.

services.title: Web Product Development
services.description: Full-stack development of data-driven web applications with modern frameworks, APIs, and scalable architectures.

services.title: Data Science, Engineering Pipelines
services.description: End-to-end data pipelines, ETL processes, and machine learning model deployment using Docker, Airflow, and cloud platforms such as AWS.

services.title: Credit Risk & Finance Analytics
services.description: Specialized financial modeling, risk assessment, and machine learning services for financial, banking and fintech industries.

workExperience.description: Leading the product vision and development of AiMod — Malaysia's first homegrown agentic AI DataOps & MLOps platform, from concept to production.
Developed Income Estimation (MAPE ~25%) and Loan Screening Machine Learning models (AUC = 0.75). Built and maintained a 6TB data warehouse with daily ETL processes on Airflow, PostgreSQL.
Developed 15-min refresh interval competitor pricing web dashboards for 300+ stakeholders and modeled a Sales Recommendation Engine that doubled average sales uplifts for key accounts.
Developed Python utility scripts for data quality monitoring and carried out buyer behavior segmentation analysis through mobile application usage data.

education.achievements: President's List — 2 Semesters, Dean's List — 4 Semesters
